in 1999 my lab at the scripps research
institute in la jolla california started
working on this question with the goal
of creating living organisms with dna
made up of a six letter genetic alphabet
the four natural letters plus two
additional new man-made letters

it would be a semi-synthetic form of

it would be able to make new proteins

all you have to remember from your high

pairs
g pairs with c and a pairs with t so to
create our new letters we synthesized
hundreds of new candidates new candidate

selectively pair with each other and
after about 15 years of work we found
two that paired together really well at

the next thing we needed to do was find
